tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor is very friendly and open to respond on our health issues and general queries. Will recommend to consult Doctor here for your health issues without any doubt.---But the front end staff and blood test department is very reluctant. They are delaying to give the report. It is more than 2 days, on top of it they say the blood sample collected was not sufficient to give the report. They did not inform that either, I have called them for the report and they say this. don't recommend diagnostic service here..
reply_text: Thank you Balaji garu for your response. Definitely will sort out the issue with the diagnostic service

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Doctor is very friendly in nature.  Explains the health issue clearly. Prescribes limited medication what is needed. Patiently listen to the problems when we are explaining, and clear our myths with detailed explanation. 
I recommend this doctor for all gynaecology issues or infertility treatment. I take this forum as an opportunity to thank Dr. Sudha once again.

review: I am happy that all the equipment is readily available to diagnose the problem in hospital itself. In some other place I found myself in a place where I have to run to some other diagnostic centre to get my tests done and make another appointment to get treated. But here it is not like that, Dr. Sudha did scanning there itself and resolved my problem carefully without any lag. She is really friendly and gave support that everything will be alright. The staff is also friendly and helpful with the appointment tracking. Hospital is hygiene and well maintained.
reply_text: Thank you for your detailed review.. hope this would be helpful for the viewers
